gunadasa, kagalla disapathi prema disanayaka yana mahathma mahathmihu mehidi rajaye wadapiliwela idiripath kalaha.me awasthawata amathiwarun wana ranjith siyambaalapitiya, pawithradewi wanniaarachchi, niyojya amathiwarun wana aacharya jagath balasuriya, lalith disanayaka, ech. aar. mithrapala, premalal disanayaka, parlimenthu manthriwarun wana kanaka herath, sani rohana kodithuwakku, ranjith da soyisa, janaka wakkumbaura mahathma mahathmihuda sabaragamuwa palath sabhawe mathi amathiwaru, janadhipathi lekam lalith si wirathunga, mudal amathyanshaye lekam aacharya pi. bi. jayasundara, mahamarga amathyanshaye lekam admiral wasantha karannagoda, polispathi mahinda balasuriya yana mahathwaru athulu amathyansha rasaka lekamwaruda, aayathana pradhanihuda, mahajana niyojithayo saha rajya ansha usas niladharihu wishala pirisak me awasthawata ekwa sitiyaha..

eewa ulpath panen mathuwi kadadasi matha ihirimen ohuge manase adum dun aathathi, thintha rekha osse kadadasi mathupita hari giyeya.wasara dahas gananakata pasu, wasara miliyana ganak thisse gangawak pruthiwiya mathupita adi yamen ganpathula sedi akhandawa panshu khadanayata lak wimen maha polowa deba wi, tektonik pingan thala pipiri- irithala- kadatholu wi gangawa athurudan weddi hethema ema polo kusthurayen nagitteya.ohu mathuwana witadith thara rekhiya lakunu walin saha ema thara lakunu osse konkrit kanuwalata gata gasunu widuli kambi jala wisin maha polowa beda iri gasa thibuni.
